snippet.title: "NOT YOUR MIND" | Eerie Indie Horror Game Without Jumpscares! (Full Gameplay/Playthrough)
snippet.description:
Lumps says: This is a pretty cool little indie game I found on Gamejolt that takes a chance and DOESN'T rely on cheap jumpscares or loud noises to build the atmosphere in their game. It's really successful, the game doesn't contain any "creepy" imagery whatsoever—but there's an unspoken sense of dread that follows you through the game that I really appreciated! It's much harder to make a horror game when you're using color, so kudos to the developer for that. Let me know what you thought of the video in the comments, LIKE AND SUBSCRIBE IF YOU'RE NEW! And if you just can't get enough Lumps Plays, check out the new Discord and Patreon. Cheers everyone!

Gamejolt says: "You are in a dreamlike world. You see strange things.
Why are you here? What is it? Why are you seeing this? Is there a reason, an explaination? An exit, maybe?
Do you need to understand it? After all, it is Not Your Mind, isn't it?"
http://gamejolt.com/games/not-your-mind/128429
http://www.indiedb.com/games/not-your-mind

Join the Lumps Plays party on Discord! https://discord.gg/65nJ3nb

Loving the pop up video commentary? Support me on Patreon! Donations go towards, you guessed it, indie games for videos!
https://www.patreon.com/lumpsplays

Want more Lumps Plays? Check out the archives:

And share the Lumps Play lovely game action with your friends! Go post it on your accounts now, I'll wait :D Cheers!
